about_the_game:
Hentai Senpai: Cosmic Beauties is a swapping/rotating puzzle game featuring sexy Cosmic Beauties!

🧩 Swapping and Rotating Puzzles

2 classic puzzles to play! Play either puzzle to unlock more Cosmic Beauties!

🔥 9 FREE Cosmic Beauties

9 Cosmic Beauties to collect for FREE!

📷 Ultra High Quality Cosmic Beauties

All Cosmic Beauties are in stunning 5K!

🖼️ Cosmic Beauties Gallery

Easy to use gallery to get close to the Cosmic Beauties!

❤️ Favourites System

Favourite your most loved Cosmic Beauties to get quick access to them!

🔄 Change & Reload

Change puzzle type or difficulty mid puzzle!

🎵 Chill Music

Chill music to listen to while with your Cosmic Beautiesi!

⚙️ Technical Settings

All the settings you need, including resolution, fullscreen, framerate cap, vsync and more!

Immerse yourself in a seductive cosmic odyssey, tantalizing puzzles, and alluring Cosmic Beauties. Collect these mesmerizing Cosmic Beauties and indulge in a celestial escapade that's as sensual as it is challenging!

content_descriptors.notes:
Hentai Senpai: Cosmic Beauties has graphic sexual content including nudity, sex, genitalia, bondage, sex toys, tentacles & masturbation.

All characters are adults (18+).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required for sweet music
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

short_description: Dive into an out of this world experience with Hentai Senpai: Cosmic Beauties; a provocative swapping/rotating puzzle game featuring 9 FREE, ultra high-quality Cosmic Beauties in stunning 5K. Solve puzzles, collect seductive Cosmic Beauties and experience an erotic journey like never before! 🧩❤️
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
